This is the first bathroom remodeling book to fully address every phase of the process, including inspiration, design and execution. The Complete Guide to Dream Bathrooms features luscious photos of on-trend baths containing the fixtures, colors and special touches that are in demand right now. But unlike most inspirational books, it doesn't stop there. This book ventures a step further to show readers precisely how to translate their dreams into a concrete plan that makes sense. Finally, more than half of the book is devoted to giving shape to those plans with tools, materials and sweat equity. Packed with step-by-step color photos, the book tackles dozens of common bathroom remodeling projects that just about any do-it-yourself can accomplish.

This revision of Black & DeckerÃ‚Â® The Complete Guide to Bathrooms retains the hardworking and highly detailed information that made the original version one of the all-time top-selling bathroom books for DIYers. The book also puts a fresh focus on subjects and products that are on the cutting edge of bathroom design, such as installing low-flow fixtures, bidets, jetted bathtubs, and even how to install a water-saving urinal.


By Ruth Strother
Published by Creative Publishing in 2010
PDF, Retail, 288 pages, English
